Title: Charity
Plot: It's Comic Relief Day and the staff of Werhnam Hogg all do their bit to raise money including Dawn, whose 'kisses for 1' stand finally provides Tim with the opportunity he's been waiting for. But when David can only produce a draft of his new gameshow concept in place of an important company report, Neil and Jennifer draw the line and inform him that he is being made redundant.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Stephen Merchant, Hugh Parker, Bruce MacKinnon
